name: Manager of Shiawase-so: Happy Manager
description:
Became the manager of "Shiawaseso", an apartment in a certain provincial city.
A one-roof romance adventure that nurtures love with the residents.

Residents are naive high school girls, half-pun high school students,
Only otaku college students with many hobbies and unique women.

While living under one roof with them, managing the apartment facilities and
Let's work on maintenance.

If you get along well, you can take a private consultation,
Drinking alcohol together in your room... and even a special job.

Now, what kind of janitor life do you plan to lead?
